description: Popsicles made with fresh peaches and ginger-flavored syrup. These can be made with the Zoku Quick Pop Maker or regular popsicle molds.
keywords: fruit popsicles recipe, Ginger Peach Popsicles, how to make popsicles
name: Ginger Peach Popsicles
recipeIngredient: 2 oz. fresh ginger root (peeled and sliced into thick coins)
2 ripe peaches (pitted and cut into chunks)

recipeInstructions.text: Combine ginger, water, and sugar in small saucepan over medium heat. Bring to a simmer and reduce heat to low. Allow syrup to simmer for 10 minutes, stirring occasionally. Remove from heat and cool.
Strain syrup through sieve into blender; discard ginger (you can eat it too if you want!). Add peaches to blender and blend until smooth.
Pour mixture into popsicle molds and freeze until solid (about 7 minutes in the Zoku Quick Pop Maker).
